attributes.action: Don’t let US trade deal dissolve our NHS.
attributes.additional_details: The video in which Donald Trump states that the NHS will be ‘on the table’ in a trade deal with the United States  - https://twitter.com/independent/status/1135918881107795974?s=21
attributes.background: Donald Trump has stated that if the UK was to enter a trade deal with the United States, everything would be ‘on the table’ including our National Health Service. We must not let this include the privatisation of our NHS.
